■Make sure the seasoning is not
below the refill line in the
dispenser.
■If the amount is below the
refill line, it may use double
the amount it should.

■In the front two rows, tilt
the dispenser so that the 1/10th
patties are level with the hole
surface. In the back, tilt the
dispenser and sprinkle the
seasoning.

■If you move the patties in
the back (even a little), then
the seasoning will be uneven
across all of the patties.
